1.0.name: wordpress/counter-strike-server-viewer
1.0.description:
With these Plugin cou can display your Counter Strike Source - or Counter Strike Global Offensive Serverinformation yon your Wordpress-Hompage.

It is easy to activate. You must onyl Downlaod the Plugin and place the String '[csviewer ip="mydomain.com" port="26015"]' on your Wordpress Page or Article,

You can change the appearance by using the CSS Tag table.server_data.

More Info:

http://rainbow-six3.com/?p=472

Function: Auto-connect by klicking on the IP. (steam Protocoll must be activated)

Display following Information: * Servername

  • Serveradress (ip/hostname and port)

  • Map

  • Mod (CS:S or CS:GO)

  • Password (Yes or No)

  • Ping

  • Player (Current Playing Player and Max allowed Player)
